page.title: 02Attitudes
page.content: Attitudes --------- West Malling is a small country town and in the last decade the pattern has changed, small businesses such as drapers, ironmongers and grocers have closed owing to the fact that supermarkets have sprung up in the district and taken the trade. If this trend continues it will prove difficult for elderly and infirm inhabitants to do their shopping. restaurants, art shops and building societies have sprung up. Recently the High Street has been resurfaced with a brick pattern which improves the look of it, appearing to be more spacious.through traffic is very heavy, this may be lessened once the proposed bypass has been built. Bus services go to neighbouring towns and trains provide service to London.
